content: That's really helpful, thanks! I've tried some of those tips before, but I'll definitely keep them in mind for my Europe trip. Another thing I'm considering is the type of activities I want to do while I'm there. When I was in Japan, I was able to change my plans on a whim and explore whatever caught my interest, which was really liberating. Do you have any recommendations for flexible tour operators or travel companies that can accommodate spontaneous changes in plans?
